StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: UPDATECLASSROOM
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.UPDATECLASSROOM(pOldNum IN VARCHAR2, pBuildingCode IN VARCHAR2, &lt;br/&gt; pNewNum IN VARCHAR2, pClassCapacity IN NUMBER) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN &lt;br/&gt; UPDATE Classroom_table clsr&lt;br/&gt; SET clsr.buildingCode = pBuildingCode,&lt;br/&gt; clsr.classNumber = pNewNum,&lt;br/&gt; clsr.classCapacity = pClassCapacity&lt;br/&gt; WHERE clsr.classNumber = pOldNum;&lt;br/&gt;END updateClassroom;
